remarks: Value of operation H, mapping a vertex v and a nonnegative integer n to the "closed n-walks v(0) ... v(n-2) v(n-1) v(n) from v = v(0) = v(n) ... with v(n-2) =/= v" according to definition 7 in [Huneke] p. 2.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Aug-2018.)
statement:
numclwwlk.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` n ) ) $.
numclwwlk.f $e |- F = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( w ` 0 ) = v } ) $.
numclwwlk.g $e |- G = ( v e. V , n e. ( ZZ>= ` 2 ) |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( w ` ( n - 2 ) ) = ( w ` 0 ) ) } ) $.
numclwwlk.q $e |- Q = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( lastS ` w ) =/= v ) } ) $.
numclwwlk.h $e |- H = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = v /\ ( w ` ( n - 2 ) ) =/= ( w ` 0 ) ) } ) $.
numclwwlkovh $p |- ( ( X e. V /\ N e. NN0 ) -> ( X H N ) = { w e. ( C ` N ) | ( ( w ` 0 ) = X /\ ( w ` ( N - 2 ) ) =/= ( w ` 0 ) ) } ) $.
$d C n v w $.
$d E n v w $.
$d F w $.
$d G w $.
$d N n v w $.
$d Q w $.
$d V n v w $.
$d X n v w $.
